[docs]        def set_max(self, max_value):
            self.max = max_value
            self.pbar = ttyProgressBar(0, max_value, width1=self.width)



[docs]        def display(self, value):
            if self.pbar:
                self.pbar.display(value)



[docs]        def close(self):
            if self.pbar:
                self.pbar.erase()
                self.pbar = None
